title: The Zero Product Property
text: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.
speech: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.
pacedSpeech: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.

title: Factoring the Equation
text: We can factor $$x^2+7x+12$$ to use the zero product property. $$x^2+7x+12=\left(x+4\right) \left(x+3\right)$$
speech: We can factor  x squared plus 7 x plus 12  to use the zero product property.  x squared, plus 7 x plus 12 is equal to parentheses x plus 4,  times, parentheses x plus 3,
pacedSpeech: We can factor   x squared plus 7 x plus 12
to use the zero product property.   x squared, plus 7 x plus 12 is equal to  x plus 4,  times,  x plus 3,

title: Using the Zero Product Property
text: As per the zero product property, if $$\left(x+4\right) \left(x+3\right)=0$$, then either $$x+4$$ or $$x+3$$ is equal to $$0$$. Setting both of these to $$0$$, we get $$x=-4$$ and $$x=-3$$. Summing these values, we get $$-4-3=-7$$
speech: As per the zero product property, if  parentheses x plus 4,  times, parentheses x plus 3,  is equal to 0 , then either  x, plus 4  or  x, plus, 3  is equal to  0 . Setting both of these to  0 , we get  x is equal to, negative 4  and  x, is equal to, negative 3 . Summing these values, we get  negative 4, minus 3 is equal to negative 7

, we get   x is equal to, negative 4
and   x, is equal to, negative 3
. Summing these values, we get   negative 4, minus 3 is equal to negative 7
